Global Ultra HD Television (UHD TV) Industry - Reportlinker Review October 13, 2015 -- 
NEW YORK , Oct. 13, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- This report analyzes the worldwide markets for Ultra HD Television (UHD TV) in Thousand Units. The Global market is further analyzed by the following Screen Sizes: 39 inch to 54 inch, 55 inch, 57 inch to 64 inch, 65 inch, and 70 inch & above. The report provides separate comprehensive analytics for the US, Canada , Japan , Europe , Asia-Pacific , Latin America , and Rest of World. Annual estimates and forecasts are provided for the period 2014 through 2020. Market data and analytics are derived from primary and secondary research. Company profiles are primarily based on public domain information including company URLs.
